text: int main ( ) { int t ; int x = 0 , y = 0 , i , z = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- > 0 ) { int n , a [ 100005 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } i = 0 ; while ( i < n - 1 ) { if ( a [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] ) { x = x + a [ i + 1 ] ; } else { y = y + a [ i ] ; } i ++ ; } z = x + y ; printf ( "%d\n" , z ) ; z = 0 ; x = 0 ; y = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
